page.title: 01Gnosall and its Environs
page.content:
Gnosall is a large village situated i a rural area about 11km to the west of Stafford. The main features of life in this area which we have sought to emphasise include:
village: recent rapid growth of population to nearly 5000 schools: St. Lawrence First School Heron Brook Middle School churches: 12th century parish church of St. Lawrence the Methodist Chapel leisure: the development of a children's play area holidays on the canal a great variety of clubs, activities and organisations farming: mainly mixed farms with dairying local events: the Summer Spectacular Gnosall Carnival
